casebody.data:
Second Department,

September, 1982

(September 1, 1982) In the Matter of Drew I. Goodman et al., Appellants, v Antonia D’Apice et al., Respondents.

Judgment of the Supreme Court, Westchester County (Coppola, J.), dated August 27,1982, affirmed, without costs or disbursements. No opinion. Mollen, P. J., Damiani, Titone, Mangano and Thompson, JJ., concur.
